Now, nearly one year ago,

523100 526234 was fighting for her life

537375 539290 the one and only Skye Riley.

604312 605879 from the demands of the tour.

633820 636518 I let you all down and...

Can we please just go again?

939342 940996 It's going to be a long day.

1155993 1159040 You chill and I'll be

1703453 1705020 to stay on top of

1731786 1734397 I'd be more than happy to help

1788930 1790714 It's purely about the kids. Yes.

2284382 2285861 You want me to sign it?

2453725 2457816 shitty of me to even

2457990 2460819 I don't really have anyone

2464779 2467260 Any chance
you'd want to come over? What, like right now?

2467434 2470742 Yeah, unless you're, you know,

2480055 2482580 Perfect. Okay, cool. See you soon.

2857998 2861306 think I had some sort of crazy

2876190 2879889 This therapist from my recovery

2880064 2883502 anytime I feel overwhelmed by

2883676 2885330 that I should stop

2885504 2887462 and drink

2887636 2889658 It's supposed to be some

2889682 2891597 for what I can

2891771 2894687 Well, it's good to see you.

2921714 2923368 forgive me

2990957 2992350 or coke in a year,

3025383 3028647 grabbed this metal gym weight

3421474 3423954 I mean, I don't know. I sort of

3424042 3426218 we should have a conversation

3432267 3434147 There are a hundred people

3453767 3456378 Thought we said 8:30.

3456553 3458250 But I'm ready.

3458424 3461253 Sorry, everyone.

3478879 3480272 I need some water

3480446 3482840 For my daughter,

3484624 3485886 I need a waiter
with some water.

3647482 3649397 One of you was out of place

3658842 3661801 I'm just saying

3753762 3756026 Hey. Everything okay?

3756200 3757636 What the fuck

3771563 3773739 ever do something

3773913 3775959 Like, come on.

3784358 3786186 Mom, you need to believe me.

3786360 3788623 He fucking did this!

3792889 3795543 But Joshua has been

3806163 3807773 ...and I want you

3816173 3819219 Oh, my God, no!

3819393 3821569 You want me

3829926 3832189 I don't know! I don't know!

3837934 3842025 Nobody will fucking listen to me

3844897 3848205 We're all here for you. We're

3850772 3853340 I think doing this tour

3853514 3856778 It's too much. I'm not... I'm not ready for it.

3856953 3859694 We're gonna, um, look at the

3859868 3862132 carve out some time for you

3862306 3864482 But right now

3866832 3869232 Because we need to be on time

3869400 3871837 Fuck, no. Mom, please

3872011 3874579 I can't get out on stage

3879018 3880759 I am not in the headspace

3880933 3882891 to put on a fucking dress

3883066 3886286 in front of a room full of strangers!

3890203 3892945 You are a woman

3893119 3895426 You are not gonna cancel

3921234 3925804 Music Inspires Hope
was founded on the idea
3925978 3928067 that no dream could be too big.

3930243 3932985 With the help and support
of everyone in this room

3933159 3935814 and from all of our donors
across the country,

3938077 3941689 to reach more families
this year than ever before.

3947391 3951656 are able to make
their wildest dreams a reality.

3963189 3965278 please put your
hands together... I'll take that.

4034739 4038351 What can I say about
how music inspires hope?

4040092 4042312 music gave me
everything I ever wanted.

4044009 4048318 Then again, music did almost
kill me, so there's that.

4048492 4051190 Uh... Well, I...
I guess that's not fair.

4051364 4053149 Music didn't put
all those drugs up my nose,

4062332 4065161 I... I think
I'm supposed to be up here

4070731 4073169 Well, when I think about
what I wish someone would have

4073343 4076650 told me when I was younger
and first getting started,

4083266 4087879 And, uh, you'll spend years
of your life chasing success

4088053 4090534 you know, thinking that
when it comes,

4090708 4094538 it will magically fix,
you know, everything
4095582 4098281 that's bad and wrong about you.

4098455 4101109 And then you achieve success,
and you realize that it can't fix

4101284 4103851 the deeply broken person
that you have always been.
4111685 4113121 how badly you wish you could
4113296 4114819 just trade it all just for
4135231 4137581 What I meant to say is:

4137755 4141237 I hope the next generation
of young artists

4152639 4154859 I'd like to introduce
our next guest,

4166523 4168264 Why does it say that?
That's not...
4212960 4214962 I can hold it. No, no, stop.

4571188 4573494 Thank you for agreeing to see...
Wait, what are you doing?

4573669 4576846 Sending a photo of you to my friend
in case you're some kind of creep.

4586507 4589380 and I invaded your
privacy. I apologize.

4589554 4591295 This is also
very weird for me.

4591469 4592869 How do you know Lewis?
I don't.

4595473 4597475 I was trying to
contact Lewis to warn him.

4597649 4599649 Tracked down his address
and went to his apartment.

4599782 4602108 The front door was unlocked,
and he was already dead inside.

4602132 4604656 I checked his phone, and you were
the last person he texted with.

4604830 4607833 W-What were you trying
to warn him about?

4608007 4611445 I'm aware that what I'm about to say
is going to sound completely insane,

4614057 4618409 He was systematically infected,
possessed and then murdered

4621281 4623414 What the fuck
are you talking about?

4623588 4628245 If it helps, you might call it
a... a spirit or a demon.

4628419 4631161 Maybe. I have no clue
what this thing is!

4633467 4637036 to look like people.
Like smiling people.

4637210 4639996 But only the person that's
been infected by it can see it.

4640170 4643086 No, that's... that's not real.
That's some supernatural bullshit.

4653923 4655763 I don't know.
I don't know what's happening.

4655794 4657970 I feel like I'm losing
my goddamn mind!

4658144 4660340 That's precisely what this thing does to you.
It's what it did to Lewis

4660364 4662583 while it was latched onto him.
It's like a parasite

4662758 4664542 that infects the host
through their mind.

4664716 4667327 In less than a week,
it drives the host insane.

4667501 4670026 It's like it feeds off
all the bad shit in their head,

4672593 4675292 it forces the host to kill
themself in front of a witness.

4675466 4677816 And then that witness
becomes the new host.

4677990 4679470 That's how you got it
from Lewis.

4679644 4682212 It was passed to Lewis
by a cop in Jersey.

4682386 4683972 That cop was the first one
I tried to contact,

4683996 4685824 but I guess he went
off the grid.

4685998 4687715 That cop caught it
from some doctor, who got it

4687739 4689325 from a patient, who got it
from a college professor.

4691177 4692962 I've documented all of this.
I can show you.

4693136 4694416 Why do you even know
all of this?

4703276 4705278 He tried to tell me
what was happening to him.

4705452 4707150 But he made it hard
to trust him,
4707324 4708499 and the stuff he was saying

4712590 4716507 He begged me for help.
But I didn't listen.
4716681 4718901 And then a few days later...

4720816 4723035 that he tore his own jaw off
with a crowbar.

4729215 4731535 Well, have you gone
to the police? And say what?

4734003 4737223 by some cosmic evil being
that no one else can see?

4737397 4739269 The police can't
stop this thing anyway.

4739443 4741377 So I'm just supposed to wait
until this thing kills me?

4745275 4748495 From what I can tell,
the chain stops

4748669 4752151 when an infected host dies
in some other way

4754458 4757417 My guess is that,
just like other parasites,
4758897 4760464 it has no way to survive.
4764903 4766383 if I die before it kills me?
